markdownRemark.html:
Responsive Ecologies toolkit (RET/tk) aims to bring rapid prototyping and programming to designers and developers. It is currently under development with the end goal of providing an authoring toolkit that allows web developers to create cross-device applications.

You can find more about the project here: Tangible Web

I work on the design and development of the platform. Tools used:

  • Node.js
  • JavaScript
  • HTML & CSS
  • Adobe XD

More information coming soon.
